resources.string: Set certain keywords, this app will automatically make text notes of relevant information that it can gather while you are using your device!
Make some changes before sharing if you wish. However the changes will NOT be saved.
Disable this app in Accessibility Settings please
Make sure to enable this app in Accessibility Settings
The keyword or regex already exists

Example keywords:
 agenda
 appointment
 remind

 Example regex:
 /.*at \d.*/ ("..at 6..")
 /.*\d{4,12}.*/ ("..pin 1234..")

AutoNotes captures only the information on your screen which contain these keywords. Example keywords are: meeting, agenda, reminder. Add keyword one at a time. Keywords are case-INsensitive. Java regular expressions (surrounded by //) are also accepted. \n For example: /.*at \\d.*/ matches \".. at 6 ..\"
Whether or not to always save notes for Clipboard contents (bypass keywords filter and note length filter).
Whether always save notes for messages that you type (bypass keywords filter and note length filter).
Minimum number of words which a text must contain, in order to be saved as note.
Are you sure to delete all notes on the day
Your feedback is very valuable! Please send feedback to the author, Twitter@hzguo or mailto:guoHouzuo@Gmail.com. Thank you!
Notify me when there is a match
Error: Failed to export notes to SD card
